allow:
Bash(gh release create v0.1.0 --title "v0.1.0" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release.

- Interactive file tree browser with directory nesting
- Syntax-highlighted diffs \(powered by chroma\)
- Responsive layout: side-by-side when wide, stacked when narrow
- Full-file diff view in less \(enter to open, q to return\)
- File search with /
- `--main` flag to diff against main branch
- Shows staged, unstaged, and untracked files
EOF
\)")
